newsitem.title: INDIA: India govt ad hoc t-bills under limits, says RBI.
newsitem.headline: India govt ad hoc t-bills under limits, says RBI.

text.p: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) on Tuesday said the federal government's net issue of ad hoc treasury bills as on October 18, 1996, continued to be under the prescribed limits.

The net issue of ad hoc treasury bills as on October 18, over the March 31, 1996 level, at 33.40 billion rupees, was below the "year-end" and the "within the year" ceilings of 50 billion and 90 billion rupees respectively, RBI said.
"The net issue of ad hoc treasury bills is below the 'within-the-year' ceiling for a period of over two months," the RBI statement said.
